rukus.text: 20|116|Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami phiraistasakalaka ka’lo, ‘tomaloke adamara prati chajadaha karaa, tetiya ibalichara bahirae sakalorae chajadaha karaile; si aman'ya karaile.

20|117|Tara pichata ami ka’lo, ‘he adama! Niscaya i tomara arau tomara straira satrau, gatike si yate konomate'i tomalokaka jannatara paraa bahiskara karaaba noraarae, ene karaile tomaloke bipadata paraiba.
20|118|Niscaya tomara babe jannatata e'i byarastha diya ha’la ye, tumi iyata ksudharta'o naha’ba arau bibastra'o naha’ba.
20|119|‘Arau niscaya tumi tata trsnaturao naha’ba, ra’dato akraanta naha’ba’.
20|120|Tara pichata cayatane te'omka kumantrana dile; si ka’le, ‘he adama! Ma'i tomaka se'ijopa gacha dekhuraamane yijopara dbaraa amaratba arau aksaya raajatba labha karaa yaya’

20|121|arasesata te'omloka (sbami-strai) ubhaye se'i gachajopara paraa (phala) khale; lage lage te'omlokara lajjasthana te'omlokara ocarata prakasa hai ga’la, arau te'omloke jannatara gachara paterae nijake abrta karaibalai dharaile, arau adame te'omra pratipalakara adesa aman'ya karaile, phalata te'om pathabhraanta hai ga’la.
20|122|Tara pichata te'omra pratipalake te'omka manonita karaile, phalata te'omra ta'oba kabula karaile arau te'omka pathanirdesa karaile.

20|123|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke ubhaye ekelage jannatara paraa nami yoraa. Tomaloke parasparae parasparara satrau. Seye yadi mora taraphara paraa tomalokara ocarata satpathara nirdesa ahi paya yiye mora pradarsita satpathara anusarana karaiba si bipathagami naha’ba arau durdasagrasta'o naha’ba.
20|124|‘Arau yiye mora smaranara paraa bimukha thakiba, niscaya tara jirana-yapana ha'ba sankucita arau ami taka kiyamatara dina andha arasthata ut'thita karaima’.
20|125|Si ka’ba, ‘he mora raba! Kiya moka andha arasthata ut'thita karaila? Athaca ma'i drstisakti sampanna achilo’.
20|126|Te'om ka’ba, ‘e'idarae'i tomara ocarata amara nidarsanarali ahichila, kintu tumi seya erai dichila thika se'idarae aji tomako (jahannamata) erai diya ha’ba’.
20|127|Arau e'idarae'i ami pratiphala di'om yiye simalanghana karae arau nija pratipalakara nidarsanarali bisbasa nakarae. Arasye akhiraatara sasti arau kathora lagate adhika sthayi.

20|128|E'itorae'o sihamtaka satpatha nedekhuraale ne ye, ami sihamtara purbe bahuto manaragosthi dhbansa karaicho yisakalara basabhumita sihamte bicarana karai thake? Niscaya iyata bibeka sampanna byaktisakalara babe ache nidarsana.
